Name: Crazy Genius
Effect: 60% base performance* but if they don't receive a performance buff* they become Lunatic at the end of the battle.

Name: Thick
Effect: Their performance cannot go past 50%.

Name: Hermit
Effect: -20%P if adjacent to a crew member* +10%P instead if alone.

Name: Cannibal
Effect: Every 2 turns they will bite an adjacent crew member for -1HP while they heal +1HP. If they drop an adjacent crew member to less than 4HP* they gain the trait Missing an Arm and a Leg.

Name: Claustrophobic
Effect: If their module isn't isolated* they become Lunatic at the end of the battle.

Name: Hypochondriac
Effect: If adjacent to someone sick or poisoned* they become Lunatic.

Name: Constipated
Effect: Upon death* they explode and shit flies everywhere* making their module and all adjacent modules excrement-flooded.

Name: Scared of the Dark
Effect: 60/50/40/30/20% Performance depending on the level of depth of the expedition.

Name: Mysterious
Effect: Once recruited* they gain a random secondary trait.

Name: Glutton
Effect: If they are healed by Tasty Seafood* Tasty Pizza* Expired Sushi* Box of Chocolates or Acid Lemons* they gain 1 max HP. // They heal 2HP instead of 1HP from those items. // 1st effect is kinda broken whenever you can reliably produce food* so probably needs to be the 2nd effect* and then Sushi Lover RIP.

Name: Rookie
Effect: 50% chance they are Stunned at the start of the battle.

Name: Rebel
Effect: At the start of each battle* they move to a random adjacent module.

Name: Prone to Panic Attacks
Effect: If their module is hit* they become stunned.

Name: Big D Energy
Effect: Until the end of the battle* copies the trait of a random adjacent crew member.

Name: Lacks Personality
Effect: Copies the trait of a random adjacent crew member.

Name: Pervert
Effect: -20%P if adjacent to a crew member of the opposite gender.

Name: Messy
Effect: The module that they were in will be excrement-flooded at the start of the next battle* for one battle only.

Name: Competitive
Effect: -20%P if alone* but it will increase to match the best-performing adjacent crew member.

Name: Dictator
Effect: +5%P to adjacent crew members* but those exposed to Dictator will forever have -10% base performance when not adjacent to Dictator.

Name: Quitter
Effect: After each battle* there's a 20% chance they quit the expedition for good.

Name: Pyromaniac
Effect: Every 2 turns* there’s a 33% chance their module sets on fire.

Name: Trips Over Easily
Effect: Every time they move* there’s a 50% chance of -1HP.

Name: Itchy Back
Effect: -20%P unless they have a crew member adjacent to the right (behind their back to scratch it).

Name: Smelly Feet
Effect: Unless their module is flooded* the crew member adjacent below will become sick at turn 4.

Name: Fragile
Effect: 3 max HP.

Name: Slow Learner
Effect: 10% base performance* but +5%P after every successful battle up to 6 times.

Name: Magic Trick Enthusiast
Effect: Every 2 turns there’s a 33% chance they swap places with a random crew member.

Name: Moody
Effect: At battle start* they will either gain 10%P or lose 10%P until the end of the battle.

Name: Tardy
Effect: They won't be present at battle start* but instead appear in their module at turn 6.

Name: Psychopath
Effect: They have a secondary trait that changes randomly at the start of every battle.

Name: Senile
Effect: At the end of each battle* there's a 20% chance they forget their profession forever.

Name: War Fanatic
Effect: +10%P in offensive modules* -20%P in defensive modules.

Name: Pacifist
Effect: +10%P in defensive modules* -20%P in offensive modules.

Name: Tilter
Effect: If you lose more than 400 ship health in a battle* they will quit the expedtion.

Name: Thief
Effect: If they or an adjacent crew member holds an item* there's a 50% chance it disappears at the end of the battle.

Name: Toxic
Effect: If you lose more than 300 ship health in a battle* -10%P to adjacent crew members.

Name: Has an Imaginary Friend
Effect: If they weren't adjacent to an empty module at the end of the battle* they become Lunatic. A random adjacent empty module will count as manned for its effect activation.

Name: Flat Earther
Effect: -20%P to adjacent scientists* and their or adjacent scientific modules will be inactive.

Name: Unlucky
Effect: Any percentage-based effect on this crew member will have a higher chance of having a negative outcome instead of a positive one.

Name: Lucky
Effect: Any percentage-based effect on this crew member will have a higher chance of having a positive outcome instead of a negative one.

Name: Insecure
Effect: If any adjacent crew member surpasses their performance* they become stunned for the rest of the battle.

Name: Jealous Professional
Effect: -20%P if they're adjacent to a crew member of their same profession.

Name: Elitist
Effect: -20%P unless every other crew member is beneath them.

Name: He Shits Himself
Effect: If they or an adjacent module is hit by the enemy* their module becomes excrement-flooded.

Name: Nervous Flirter
Effect: Each turn* there’s a 30% chance they become Stunned if adjacent to a crew member of the opposite gender.

Name: Geek
Effect: +10%P in modules of X type* and -20%P in any other module type* where the X type is only known when recruited.

Name: Serial Killer
Effect: Only exists as a hidden secondary trait on applicants in the shop. If an adjacent crew member has 2 or less HP* they are murdered* but the Serial Killer trait will remain hidden.

Name: Vain
Effect: 5% Performance* but -5% Performance to adjacent Crew Members.

Name: Low Self-esteem
Effect: If their performance is lowered* then it is lowered an extra 20%.

Name: Exhibitionist
Effect: Every 4 turns* they will stun a random adjacent crew member.

Name: Empathetic
Effect: When an adjacent crew member suffers an ailment* they also suffer the same ailment.

Name: Argumentative
Effect: Once per battle* if adjacent to a crew member and after you lose 300 ship health* they both become Stunned for the rest of the battle.

Name: Bad Eyesight
Effect: -10%P versus small enemies* but +10%P instead versus big enemies.

Name: Elderly
Effect: 15% chance of dropping dead at the end of a battle.

Name: Boss Wannabe
Effect: At battle start* 1 random module will swap around with another.

Name: Masochist
Effect: -20%P* but +10%P every time they lose HP.

Name: Sadistic
Effect: If an adjacent crew member loses health* +10%P.

Name: Could be 2 Kids in a Trenchcoat
Effect: 50% chance that after being recruited they divide into two cadets with 40% base performance.

Name: Cthulhu Worshipper
Effect: If an enemy has tentacles* every 2 turns there’s a 20% chance they leave the ship to embrace the enemy and die.

Name: Selfish
Effect: If they're about to get hit by the enemy* they swap modules with the nearest crew member right before the hit.

Name: Procrastinator
Effect: Every battle* they won’t have a profession until 5 turns have passed.

Name: Doppelganger Victim
Effect: At turn 10* their clone will appear in a random Module* but they will have a random evil trait instead. The clone will move until adjacent to their victim and then damage them for -1HP/2turns.

Name: In Love
Effect: They always appear in pairs in the shop. +10%P if adjacent to another In Love crew member* but if an In Love crew member dies* the other will become Lunatic.

Name: Casanova
Effect: When recruited* they and a random crew member will have In Love as their secondary traits.

Name: Ex-partner
Effect: After 20 turns following recruitment* they and a random crew member will both change their trait to either In Love or Toxic Lover.

Name: Toxic Lover
Effect: When recruited* a random crew member will change their trait to Toxic Lover. Every 2 turns* one Toxic Lover will gain 1 Health while the other loses 1 Health.

Name: Martyr
Effect: If an adjacent crew member loses HP* there’s a 50% chance they sacrifice their own HP instead.

Name: Unhygienic
Effect: Every 2 turns there's a 20% chance they get sick.

Name: Anti-Masker
Effect: 30% of making an adjacent crew member Sick every 2 turns.

Name: Full of Shit
Effect: Upon death* they explode and shit flies everywhere* making their module and all adjacent modules excretion-flooded.

Name: Bully
Effect: -20%P to the lowest-performing crew member in the ship.

Name: Friendzoned
Effect: When recruited* a random crew member is selected* adjacent to which the Friendzoned will have -20%P.

Name: Old-fashioned
Effect: Only appears in men. -20%P if adjacent to women.

Name: Lazy and Rich
Effect: 40% base performance. If their performance was lowered* receive 1 coin at the end of the battle.

Name: Drunkard
Effect: If their module is attacked* there’s a 50% chance it’s set on fire.

Name: Selfless
Effect: If a crew member is about to die* they sacrifice their own life instead.

Name: Hero Mindset
Effect: If your ship health runs out* they sacrifice themselves to avoid the defeat and your ship is rescued back to 200 health.

Name: Unreliable
Effect: Every time you enter a market or emporium* there's a 33% chance they swap themselves for another crew member.

Name: Best Buddies
Effect: This trait always appears in pairs in the shop. They can only be recruited if both applicants are. +10%P when adjacent to each other.

Name: Emo
Effect: 35/40/45/50/55% base performance depending on the level of depth of the expedition.

Name: Pregnant
Effect: Always comes with a secondary trait. After 2 battles she becomes automatically equipped with Lucky Baby. If they lose hold of this item except by its own effect* they become Lunatic. The crew member this Lucky Baby turns into will have the same trait as the mother's secondary trait.

Name: Has the Flu
Effect: For the battle after they’re recruited* each other crew member has a 50% chance of becoming sick.

Name: Uncontrollable Flatulences
Effect: Every 4 turns* a Fart Bubble is formed in the vicinity (even if you don’t have an available slot) and there's a 50% chance they excrement-flood their module.

Name: Ex-prisoner
Effect: Will try to dig a hole in their module out of habit* which will cause it to become water-flooded at turn 6.

Name: Spiritual Meditator
Effect: Upon death* they will revive with their trait changed to Ghost.

Name: Seasick
Effect: At battle start* 40% chance they puke* excrement-flooding their module. After not puking twice in a row* they never puke again.

Name: Liar
Effect: Only exists as a hidden secondary trait on applicants in the shop. Once recruited their trait will change to Liar* will gain a random secondary trait* and their profession will change to another random one.

Name: Can’t Swim
Effect: If their module is water-flooded* -1HP/2turns.

Name: Has Explosive Diarrhea
Effect: Every 2 turns there's a 33% chance that their module and a random adjacent one become excrement-flooded.

Name: Necromancy Enthusiast
Effect: If a crew member dies* there's a 50% chance they are revived with their trait changed to Reanimated.

Name: Has War Flashbacks
Effect: If they are in an offensive or defensive module* they become Lunatic by the end of the battle.

Name: Anti-Vaxxer
Effect: Adjacent Doctors will have -20%P.

Name: Traitor
Effect: Only exists as a hidden secondary trait on applicants in the shop. After 2 battles* at the start of each battle there’s a 50% chance Traitor is revealed and they proceed to sabotage the expedition damading adjacent crew members for -1HP/4turns.

Name: Undercover Competitor
Effect: Only exists as a hidden secondary trait on applicants in the shop. After 2 battles* it will be revealed you have an Undercover Competitor* but not who they are* and everything in the shop will cost 1 extra coin.

Name: Hearing Loss
Effect: At battle start* there's a 50% chance they swap to another module of the same type as the one they’re in.

Name: Sensitive to Smells
Effect: -20%P for as long as you have an excrement-flooded Module.

Name: Has Gross Eating Habits
Effect: If there’s an excrement-flooded module* they will swap places into that module* clean it up* and gain 1 HP.

Name: Puppeteering Enthusiast
Effect: At battle start creates a Wooden Puppet in an adjacent module.

Name: Robot
Effect: Always has 60% base performance. +10%P in automatised modules* and its performance can’t be increased or decreased any other way. Cannot recover HP. If flooded it will short-circuit and die.

Name: Snitch
Effect: If placed adjacent to the Captain* they will reveal who is a Serial Killer or Undercover Competitor* as well as who is a Liar* Traitor* Usurper or Cheeky Undergrad in the Shop.

Name: Porn Addict
Effect: -20%P if in or adjacent to an automatised Module.

Name: Enthusiastic Handyman
Effect: At the end of battle* if their module doesn’t have them* there’s a 20% chance they add a defect and a 80% chance they add a side effect.

Name: Avid Swimmer
Effect: If their module is water-flooded* every 2 turns they will swap places with random water-flooded modules. // Once per battle you can move them from one water-flooded module to another.

Name: Cheeky Undergrad
Effect: This trait won’t show during recruitment* instead they will show another random trait. Once recruited* their trait will change to Cheeky Undergrad and their profession will change to Cadet.

Name: Parties Hard 1
Effect: In the next battle after a victorious battle* those that were adjacent to them will become Sleepy.

Name: Passionate About Science
Effect: +10%P if they are a Doctor* Scientist or Biologist. If they're not* +5%P while adjacent to a Doctor* Scientist or Biologist.

Name: Massage Expert
Effect: +5%P to the crew member adjacent to the left.

Name: Chronic Masturbator
Effect: After 5 battles they will go blind and gain Bad Eyesight as their secondary trait.

Name: Uncontrolled Illusionist
Effect: 5 turns after a battle starts* there’s a 50% chance the enemy turns out to be a different kind of enemy.

Name: Allergic to Seafood
Effect: Will be Sick for as long as they’re not in the rightmost column in the ship. Instead of healing* -1HP if they take Expired Sushi or Tasty Seafood.

Name: Having a Bad Break
Effect: At battle start* there’s a 50% chance they become afflicted with 1 random Ailment (except for Lunatic).

Name: Escape Artist
Effect: If their module explodes* they escape to the nearest empty module or to the bench right before the explosion.

Name: Speaks Fish Language
Effect: Every time the enemy attacks* there’s a 20% chance they talk a small enemy creature into not attacking and the hit is cancelled.

Name: Usurper
Effect: Only exists as a hidden secondary trait on applicants in the shop. After 2 battles* at the start of each battle there’s a 50% chance Usurper is revealed and they proceed to move every 4 turns closer to the captain. If adjacent to the captain* their main trait changes to Boss Wannabe.

Name: Global Warming Denier
Effect: Their or djacent Scientific modules won’t have any effect.

Name: Unsure About their Profession
Effect: After every battle* whether or not they participated* their profession changes permanently to another random one.

Name: Heavy Snoring
Effect: If they become Asleep* they snore heavily* waking up any other Asleep crew members* but -5%P to adjacent crew members.

Name: Bodybuilder
Effect: +2 max HP and +5% base performance. In the shop it always comes paired with Vain* Competitive* Low Self-esteem* Bully* Ex-prisoner or Thick.

Name: Alucard
Effect: If they’re missing Health* once every 4 turns +1HP and -1HP to a random adjacent crew member.

Name: Ghost
Effect: Can’t die or take damage. There’s a 50% chance they don’t show up to each battle.

Name: Stoned
Effect: -20%P* +1HP/4turns and +2 max HP.

Name: Insured Out of His Ass
Effect: At the end of each battle* if they lost HP* you lose 2 coin. If they died* you lose 2 coins.

Name: Hates Kids
Effect: -20%P if adjacent to a Cadet* someone with Rookie trait* with Lucky Baby or adjacent to someone with Lucky Baby.

Name: Thinks They’re a Fish
Effect: -20%P* but +1HP/4turns and +10%P instead if their module is water flooded.

Name: Weak Immune System
Effect: If someone is sick* they also become sick.

Name: Normal
Effect: Just a normal person for once. No effect.

Name: Expecting a Delivery
Effect: If their module is hit by a physical attack* they will open the door and drown.

Name: Plays With Boogers
Effect: Once placed in their module* they get stuck and can’t be moved to a different module.

Name: He Pisses Himself
Effect: If this or an adjacent module is hit* 50% chance their module becomes water-flooded.

Name: Shoddy Plumber
Effect: If their or an adjacent module becomes water-flooded* they will fix it in 2 turns. 4 turns later* there’s a 50% chance the plumbing collapses and the module becomes excrement-flooded.

Name: Cleaning Freak
Effect: If their module is water-flooded or excrement-flooded* they become Lunatic* but +5%P while there's no flooding at all in the ship.

Name: Sushi Chef
Effect: If hit by the enemy* 33% chance that it produces 1 Tasty Seafood.

Name: One-trick Pony
Effect: +10%P in modules of the same type as the first module they were ever placed in* and -20%P in other types of module.

Name: Short-tempered
Effect: If adjacent crew members are under 40%P* their trait will change to Lunatic until the end of the battle.

Name: Easily Distracted
Effect: If an adjacent module is disturbed* -20%P for 2 turns.

Name: Seafood Eater
Effect: Once every 4 turns* they will move closer to the nearest Organic module. When adjacent to one* they will eat it (the occupant relocates to an empty module or dies) and heal to full HP.

Name: Ate an Expired Yoghourt
Effect: At battle start* there's a 40% chance they excrement-flood their module. After not excrement-flooding twice in a row* they never do it again.

Name: Heavy Smoker
Effect: Every 4 turns* a Smoke Bubble is formed in the vicinity (even if you don’t have an available slot)* but at the end of each battle -1HP.

Name: Infested with Bedbugs
Effect: Any module that they’re in is marked because it becomes infested with bedbugs. Any other crew member in that module has a 50% chance of becoming Lunatic at the end of the battle.

Name: Bone Architect
Effect: For every 2 crew members that die* receive one Bone Capsule.

Name: Corpse Looter
Effect: For every crew member that dies* +1HP and they give you 1 coins. If the corpse was of a Businessman* they give you 2 coins.

Name: Unleashed Power
Effect: If their module explodes* they survive and unleash newfound power changing their trait to Blastman/Blaswoman.

Name: Gruesome Body
Effect: If they die* they reappear after 2 battles with their trait changed to Monstrous.

Name: Easily Bored
Effect: At turn 10 they become Sleepy.

Name: Obsessed Collector
Effect: +3% base performance for every different item they’ve ever held.

Name: Has OCD
Effect: +10%P If your ship is top-bottom symmetrical* but if it's not* -20%P instead* and if that happens two battles in a row they become Lunatic.

Name: Hired Assassin
Effect: Their aim is to kill the War General. Will swap places to be adjacent to the War General* and then deal to them -1HP/2turns.

Name: Scared of Heights
Effect: If they’re not placed in the lowest possible row* -20%P.

Name: Alien-looking
Effect: 60% base performance* but at the start of a battle* 40% chance of abducting themselves together with an adjacent crew member* and after 1 battle passes* only said crew member will return* with their trait changed to Has Amnesia.

Name: Caveman
Effect: -20%P in Scientific modules* +10%P Organic modules and those with the wild element.

Name: Had Plastic Surgery
Effect: At the end of each battle* there's an increase in 20% chance that their trait changes to Caveman* starting at 0%.

Name: All-nighter Metalhead 2
Effect: In the next battle after a victorious battle* those that were adjacent to them will become Sleepy.

Name: Sushi Lover
Effect: Heals +2HP instead of +1HP when eating a Tasty Seafood or Expired Sushi. Eats Monstrous crew members and enemy parasites healing +2HP. // It kinda overlaps with Glutton.

Name: Never Reads Manuals
Effect: If their module has requirements* they’re ignored but the module is due to become permanently unstable after 5 battles.

Name: Home Chef
Effect: After every battle* any adjacent members will have a 3% chance of gaining the Glutton trait.

Name: Also a Bartender
Effect: After every battle* any adjacent members will have a 33% chance of gaining the Drunkard trait.

Name: Also an Electrician
Effect: If a module is hit by the enemy* they will heal the ship health damage back up* however whenever they do so there’s a 40% chance they die electrocuted.

Name: Caregiver
Effect: If adjacent to the Caregiver* Centenarians will only have a 10% chance of dropping dead after a battle* and Elderly 5%. Adjacent crew members have a 50% chance of avoiding an Ailment if they get one.

Name: Also a Lawyer
Effect: If a crew member died or a module exploded* 30% chance of -1 coins* 50% chance of +1 coin* and  20% chance of +2 coins.

Name: Titanic Connoisseur
Effect: If their Module or any adjacent one is Water-flooded* they will immediately quit the expedition. If you encounter a Shipwreck* it will yield better loot.

Name: Funeral Organiser
Effect: If a crew member died in the previous battle* all crew member effects other than stacking bonuses will be deactivated for the first 5 turns.

Name: Frankenstein Fan
Effect: If in a scientific module and an adjacent crew member dies* there’s a 50% chance they return after the battle without a Profession and with the Thick trait. // Reanimated trait.

Name: Also a Politician
Effect: After each battle* there’s a 50% chance they take 1 coin from you. They don’t do anything useful. If they die* you get 80% of the coins they took back.

Name: Also a Priest
Effect: If a crew member dies* under no circumstance will they return in any shape or form* and will instead rest in peace.

Name: Cursed
Effect: Every enemy attack has a 33% chance of targeting them. If their Module is hit* there’s a 25% chance it explodes. If they die* they will return after 1 battle.

Name: Possessed
Effect: Every 4 turns* -1HP or gain a random ailment other than Lunatic. If they die* another random crew member becomes Possessed instead.

Name: Constantly Picks their Scabs
Effect: Every turn they lose 1 HP* then gain 1 HP* then lose 1 HP* and so on.

Name: Has Amnesia
Effect: At battle start* 50% chance they don’t have their profession for this battle.

Name: Also a Veterinarian
Effect: If an enemy at or below 10% HP* they heal the enemy once per battle for 5% of their HP.

Name: Apocalypse Paranoid
Effect: The first module that they’re placed in becomes an Isolation Bunker.

Name: Night Owl
Effect: 25% chance of becoming Sleepy every 2 turns.

Name: A Karen
Effect: When you buy from a market or emporium* there's a 50% chance the purchase is 1 coin cheaper. Always comes paired with Argumentative.

Name: Loves Rainbows
Effect: If you have 1 of each type of module* +10%P.

Name: Big Fan
Effect: If you don’t recruit this applicant* they will show up very frequently in the shop (every applicant has a 10% chance of being the same Big Fan).

Name: BDSM Enthusiast
Effect: -1HP/4turns to a random adjcent crew member* and +5%P to the BDSM Enthusiast whenever that happens.

Name: Loves Comfort
Effect: +5%P in Normal modules* -10%P in other types of module.

Name: Professor
Effect: If adjacent to a Cadet for 2 battles in a row* the Cadet will become their profession.

Name: Loves Fireworks
Effect: If a Module explodes* +20%P.

Name: Posh Millionaire
Effect: -20%P unless their module cost 8 coins* in which case there's a 50% chance they tip you 1 coin at the end of each battle.

Name: Creepy Stalker
Effect: -20% Performance unless their Module is adjacent to the Captain. Unless they die* they will be likely to show up in future expeditions (on average showing once every 4 Shops).

Name: Kidnapper
Effect: At the end of the battle* there's a 30% chance an adjacent crew member disappears and doesn't return unless you pay 1 coin.

Name: Builds Ships in Bottles
Effect: If disturbed by an adjacent module* -1 HP to the crew member in the module the disturbance came from. If undisturbed for a battle* produces the item Ship in a bottle.

Name: Gifted
Effect: Only applies to men. At the end of battle* there's a 25% chance that a random woman on the ship becomes Pregnant.

Name: Recycling Fanatic
Effect: Each shop event* you can sell back 1 module in your bench for half its original coin value.

Name: Tap Dance Enthusiast
Effect: -20%P to the crew member below their module* but will also prevent them from becoming Sleepy or Asleep.

Name: Hypothermic
Effect: Operates and performs normally even if their module is Frozen.

Name: Radioactive
Effect: Any crew member adjacent to them for 2 battles in a row will become permanently Sick.

Name: Big Daddy
Effect: If an adjacent crew member is damaged by the enemy* they deal 50 damage to the enemy.

Name: Missing an Arm and a Leg
Effect: Only has 3 base HP* however if attacked there’s a 33% chance the enemy misses.

Name: Amateur Surgeon
Effect: If an adjacent crew member has 2 or less HP* they will attempt to do surgery on them* with a 50% chance they fully heal and 50% chance they lose 1 HP and become Sick. Up to once per crew member each battle.

Name: Learns From Mistakes
Effect: Won’t suffer damage from an enemy attack more than once per battle.

Name: Clumsy
Effect: If they hold an item* 33% chance that it breaks at the end of the battle.

Name: Uni-tasker
Effect: -20%P if they hold an item.

Name: Hoarder
Effect: Once they receive an item it cannot be unequipped or swapped by any means.

Name: Generous
Effect: At battle start they will gift their item to a random adjacent crew member.

Name: Jealous
Effect: Every 4 turns there’s a 50% chance they steal an adjacent crew member’s item even if they hold one themselves.

Name: Thinks This is All a Dream
Effect: If they wake up from being Asleep they will disappear.

Name: Emotionally Attached
Effect: If an adjacent crew member dies* -10% base performance.

Name: Sleepwalker
Effect: If Asleep* every 4 turns moves to an adjacent module.

Name: Has Sweet Dreams
Effect: If Asleep +1 HP every 4 turns.

Name: Has Nightmares
Effect: If Asleep -1 HP every 4 turns.

Name: Does the Opposite
Effect: Their performance gains and losses are reversed.

Name: Gambling Addict
Effect: At the end of battle they gamble with your coins: if you have at least 2 coins* 50% chance you lose 2 coins and 50% chance you gain 2 coins.

Name: Expert Gardener
Effect: +10%P in a Wild module* and can be moved in and out of it.*

Name: Forgetful
Effect: 50% chance at battle start that they leave their item behind on the bench.

Name: Vegetarian
Effect: +1HP/4 turns if in a Wild module.

Name: Spits Fire
Effect: Every 4 turns spits fire at the enemy for 50 damage with a 50% chance of causing burn and sets on fire a random adjacent module.

Name: Careless
Effect: At the end of the battle* if their module didn't have a defect* it gains a random defect except for Noisy Engine* Flaming Engine* Demanding or Inhibitor.

Name: Babysitter
Effect: Always comes with Lucky Baby equipped. If they lose hold of this item except by its own effect* they become Lunatic.

Name: Loves Ruins
Effect: +10%P in a damaged module.

Name: Repairman Wannabe
Effect: If their module is damaged they repair it* but there's a 33% chance they add a defect to it.

Name: Hates Society
Effect: Every 4 turns there’s a 33% chance their module becomes Detached.

Name: Isolationist
Effect: -20%P* but +20%P instead if their module is detached.

Name: Baker
Effect: If their module is set on fire produce 1 Tasty Pizza.

Name: Orchestra Conductor
Effect: If they and 4 adjacent crew members all have the exact same performance* +5%P to all five.

Name: Coward
Effect: If they or any adjacent module is hit* their module will become detached.

Name: Danger Addict
Effect: -10%P* but +20%P instead if they’re in an unstable module.

Name: No Driver’s Licence
Effect: Their module will be inactive.

Name: Environmentalist
Effect: Their module will become Wild at the end of the battle.

Name: Allergic to Pollen
Effect: -1HP/4turns in a Wild module.

Name: Wood Sculptor
Effect: If in or adjacent to a Wild module produce 1 Wooden Puppet at the end of battle

Name: Fire Fighter
Effect: If an adjacent module is set on fire they will put out the fire after 2 turns and there’s a 10% chance they die in the process.

Name: Coastguard
Effect: If a crew member dies in an adjacent module that's flooded* they will rescue them and send them to the bench with 1HP.

Name: High Body Temperature
Effect: Their module thaws from frozen after 2 turns.

Name: Loves Popsicles
Effect: If their module is frozen they are immune to it and +10%P.

Name: Hyperactive
Effect: For every performance boost they receive* +10%P* but every 4 turns there’s a 10% chance their module becomes damaged.

Name: Deep Thinker
Effect: -10%P but if their module is inactive* +10%P instead.

Name: Jungle Rescuer
Effect: At the end of battle will send any adjacent crew members in wild modules to the bench.

Name: Marathon Runner
Effect: Every 4 turns moves to an adjacent module they haven’t been in this battle yet.

Name: Sworn Enemy
Effect: When recruited* will declare another random crew member as their Sworn Enemy and they'll gain that as their secondary trait. From there onwards* unless there’s a distance of 5 modules between them* they will hurt each other and both lose 1HP/2turns.*

Name: Cult Leader
Effect: Adjacent crew members have +5%P but will also suffer the same ailment loss of HP and death of the occupier.

Name: Perfectionist
Effect: -20%P if there’s a requirement in your ship that isn’t being met but +10%P instead if all requirements are being met.

Name: Simple
Effect: -20%P but +10%P instead if their module has no requirements* side effects or defects.

Name: Nature Lover
Effect: -20%P but +10%P instead if their module has an element.

Name: Monster Tamer
Effect: Every time they’re hit by the enemy* the enemy loses 10dpt.

Name: Cocky Taunter
Effect: The enemy has a 33% chance of targeting them with each hit.

Name: Avoids Responsibilities
Effect: The first time per battle that they or their module are afflicted with an ailment or element* it’s instead passed onto a random adjacent module.

Name: Consistent
Effect: Their performance cannot be changed by any means.

Name: Extreme Performer
Effect: +5dpt for every 20%P over their base performance* but -5dpt for every 10%P below their base performance.

Name: Oblivious
Effect: Their performance doesn't matter* they'll always have the effects of having 40%P.

Name: Unleashed Talent
Effect: Has 0% base performance* but every time their performance is increased* +10% base performance up to 6 times.

Name: Master of Concentration
Effect: If at 80%P or above* +1HP/4turns.

Name: Suffers from Burnout
Effect: -20%P* unless they rested in the bench for one battle in which case +10%P instead.

Name: Monster Enrager
Effect: If hit by the enemy* they deal 50 damage but the enemy gains +10dpt.

Name: Blood Donor
Effect: If they lost health gain 1 coin at the end of the battle.

Name: Hypnotist
Effect: If undisturbed for 4 turns puts the enemy to sleep.

Name: Juggler
Effect: Can hold up to 3 items.

Name: Wall Painter
Effect: At the end of the battle* their module changes to another random type.

Name: Insecure Professional
Effect: -20%P for the next battle if a new applicant of the same profession was recruited.

Name: Special Bonding
Effect: Will bond to a random adjacent crew member in their first battle changing their trait to also Special Bonding at the end of the battle. +10%P to both crew members but if they are ever separated they both die.

Name: Loves Instruction Manuals
Effect: +10%P If they’re in a module with fulfilled requirements.

Name: Hates Complex Work
Effect: -20%P but +10%P instead if their module is inactive.

Name: Flirter
Effect: -20%P* but +5%P instead if they're adjacent to someone of the opposite sex.

Name: Copycat
Effect: At turn 8 and until the end of battle* their module copies a random adjacent module. // At battle start* their module copies a random module in the bench or ship.

Name: Careless Tenant
Effect: Will pay you a rent of 1 coin at the end of each battle* however they don't treat their module well* so it will gain a defect at the end of the battle* and if it already had one* then it becomes damaged.

Name: Monstrous
Effect: Every 4 turns* -1HP to an adjacent crew member* unless they’re also Monstrous. If hit by the enemy* they hit back for 50 damage. If their module is destroyed* instead of dying they return to an available module or the bench.

Name: Doomed
Effect: Performance is halved and will inevitably die after 20 turns.

Name: Reanimated
Effect: Their skin will be grey and cracked. Their Performance will slowly decrease at a rate of -1%/2turns.

Name: The Chosen One
Effect: They will have 16 Health* 100% base performance and are immune to explosions* but if they die you lose the expedition.

Name: Blastman
Effect: They rescue from death and send to the bench full HP up to 4 crew members* after which they quit the expedition to help in other places.

Name: Centenarian
Effect: They are generated with 3 HP* and have a 70% chance of dropping dead at the end of each battle.

Name: Human Calculator
Effect: Can predict the outcome of any %-based events for their or adjacent modules.

Name: Circuitry Specialist
Effect: The module that they’re in and adjacent ones cannot explode or become unstable.

Name: Plumbing Expert
Effect: The module that they’re in and adjacent ones cannot be flooded* nor can parasites* spores or gases invade their module.

Name: Skilled Hacker
Effect: Ignore the requirements of the module they’re in.

Name: Avid Learner
Effect: At the end of the battle they can change their profession to that of an adjacent crew member.

Name: Expert Investor
Effect: If you go to a shop event without buying anything* increase your savings by 15%.

Name: Multidisciplinary
Effect: At battle start* offers the chance of choosing between two professions.

Name: Born Leader
Effect: After turn 2* prevents other crew members from being stunned or suffering from performance losses.

Name: Expert Negotiator
Effect: When you make a purchase* there's a 50% chance it becomes 80% cheaper. (supposing you can only buy all the stuff at once from a shop)

Name: Excellent Teamworker
Effect: +0/5/10/15/20%P based on whether they have 0/1/2/3/4 adjacent crew members.

Name: Multitasker
Effect: +15%P if they hold an item.

Name: Maximum Concentration
Effect: Works under any condition; immune to module elements.

Name: Tough
Effect: Immune to all ailments.

Name: First Aid Expert
Effect: Once per battle* fix the ailment of a random adjacent crew member after 2 turns.

Name: Expert repairman
Effect: If placed in a damaged module* they will fix it at the end of the battle.

Name: Teleportation
Effect: Once per battle* can be teleported to another module* even if it’s swapping with another crew member.

Name: Spark Aura
Effect: If their module is attacked* they will take half the damage (minimum 1 HP) and deal 100 dmg to the enemy.

Name: Telekinesis
Effect: Once per battle* you can swap around two modules or two items in your ship as long as it meets their requirements.

Name: Waterbender
Effect: Once per battle* you can water-flood any module* or undo a water-flooded module. If their module is water-flooded* they’re immune to it and them and adjacent crew members will have a 60% chance of being protected from enemy hit by water shields.

Name: Telepathic
Effect: Every crew member in the ship counts as adjacent.

Name: Omega Brain
Effect: Every performance increase is doubled* and their performance cap is 150%.

Name: Transcended
Effect: Once per battle* can change their own primary trait to a random one guaranteed to be positive.

Name: Luckmancer
Effect: They and adjacent crew members have a 50% chance of avoiding unlucky effects from happening.

Name: Mind Controller
Effect: Once per battle* can make an adjacent crew member change their profession and trait to that of another crew member in the ship.

Name: Colossal Strength
Effect: If you lose all of your ship health* they will hold the ship together with their own health* taking 1 HP for every 200 dmg to the Ship* and if you win the battle your ship will be back with 200 ship health.

Name: Firebender
Effect: Once per battle* you can set on fire any module* or undo a set on fire module. If their module is set on fire*they’re immune to it and +20%P and +1HP/4turns.

Name: Naturebender
Effect: Once per battle* you can make a module Wild or undo Wild in a module. If their module is Wild* they’re immune to it and +1HP/8turns to everyone in the ship.

Name: Shitbender
Effect: Once per battle* you can excrement-flood any module* or undo an excrement-flooded module. If their module is excrement-flooded* they’re immune to it and the enemy will be poisoned // -50HP/turn.

Name: Icebender
Effect: Once per battle* freeze this and an adjacent module* and both their crew members are immune to the negative effects of freezing.

Name: Rogue Warrior
Effect: At battle start* their module becomes detached and they gain +20%P* and the module returns to the ship at the end of the battle.

Name: Uncontrollable Power
Effect: 70% base performance but their module is unstable. If the module explodes* they’re returned to the bench.

Name: Power Drainer
Effect: All adjacent modules are disabled. For each adjacent disabled module* +20dpt.

Name: Controller of Elements
Effect: Every time a module suffers from an element* you can instead move that element to a different module in the ship.
